titles.title: Date of Registry and Legal Amnesty Restoration Act of 2003
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act with respect to the record of admission for permanent residence in the case of certain aliens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Date of Registry and Legal Amnesty Restoration Act of 2003 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend the admission date for permanent residence for certain aliens, including additional one-year extensions during specified time periods.
